content.rendered:
Dev Support Engineer – Oregon, US

What was your very first job?

My first job was as a Busboy at a restaurant where my dad was working at the time. I was 15 and trying to make a few bucks so I could go to the movies whenever I wanted!

How did you get into your current job or field?

When I was in Middle School I asked myself, “what would a green pikachu look like?” This led me down a path of Graphic Design which eventually led to an interest in Computer Science which laid the foundation for my career today.

What’s a fun fact about you that not many people know?

All facts about me are fun! 😉 A few facts:

  • I dye my own hair.
  • I attended Mother Teresa’s funeral.
  • I started the process to get my level 1 sommelier (wine) in college but I never completed it because I ended up pursuing a career in tech.
  • I dress up as spiderman and go to comic book conventions and am trying to convince the CEO to let me go to kubecon dressed as superfresh!

 
What is your favorite activity or hobby that you enjoy outside of work?

I love hiking, Legos, playing video games, and comic books….and folding clothes while people are still in them (aka Brazilian Jiu Jitsu!).

What is your best memory about working at Codefresh?

Meeting with my team for the first time and getting a feel of the atmosphere and energy of the company. Every happy hour is well-thought-out and every care package we get feels like a mini Christmas!

excerpt.rendered: Every get-together is well-thought-out and every care package we get feels like a mini Christmas!
